publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1982 Iain Smith on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Timescales and Stages of Bills—That the Parliament notes the Procedures Committee’s 7th Report, 2004 (Session 2), Timescales and Stages of Bills (SP Paper 228), and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 10 January 2005. Supported by: Karen Gillon*
